kateacuff.comment: Given the consensus among my fellow board members, I agree with this motion's goals. It aligns with the board's priorities and serves the community's best interests.

ellenosborne.comment: Given the unanimous support from my fellow board members, I believe this motion has merit and deserves approval.

grahampaige.comment:
As board chairperson, I appreciate the input from all board members. All votes have been counted now, so let me officially declare the outcome.
With six abstaining votes - including myself - and zero "n" or "no" votes cast,
this motion has passed unanimously without objections.
